channel.title: Vim on hack(pravj)
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on hack(pravj)

item.title: Deal With It
item.description: Hilarious fable on HN featuring the superhero Unix and its trusted sidekick - Vim! ring ring ring yeah, what’s up? Nagios is paging, something with that code you pushed live a couple hours ago is throwing a fit… looks like half the web cluster is on the verge of going to swap, can you look into it? asap! Well, I’m on at the bus stop and won’t be near a computer for at least an hour…yeah, I’ll sort it out, will text you when we can push fix live.
